name: Scrap Zap
description: Discover Scrap Zap from Thermo Fisher Scientific, featuring the Thermo Scientific™ Niton™ XL2 Plus handheld XRF analyzer. Unleash a fun and challenging game as you experience life as a scrap metal recycler. Generate as much money as possible by zapping scrap metal objects while avoiding non scrap metal obstructions. Advance through 3 different levels to win!
